title: Number of hospitals in Canada by province 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of establishments in the y axis.
Month Ontario has the highest Number of establishments and Yukon has the lowest Number of establishments.
The highest Month Ontario has 491.0 more Number of establishments than the lowest Month Yukon.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of establishments for 13 number of Months.
The Number of establishments is appeared to be the highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of establishments in the y axis.
Month Ontario has the highest Number of establishments and Yukon has the lowest Number of establishments.
The highest Month Ontario has 491.0 more Number of establishments than the lowest Month Yukon.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of establishments for 13 number of Months.
Month Ontario has the highest Number of establishments and Yukon has the lowest Number of establishments.
Month Quebec has the second highest value for Number of establishments.
The minimum Month Yukon has got 492.0 times less Number of establishments than the maximum Month Ontario.
Month Ontario is higher than any other Months with value 492.0, followed by Quebec, and British Columbia. Down to Month Yukon with the lowest value 1.0.
The Number of establishments has declined over the past 13 Months.
Month Northwest Territories, and Nunavut share the same value 19.0.
Considered together, the average Number of establishments in all 13 Months is roughly 112.77.
